short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A recipe import companion tool for Plan to Eat web and mobile apps

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Plan to Eat Recipe Clipper makes meal planning more painless than ever with easy import and editor features.
With the Plan to Eat extension, you can:

- Import recipes into your Recipe Book without ever leaving the browser
- Tweak imported recipes in the integrated Recipe Editor
- View the Recipe Editor in a side panel that doesn't cover up content in the current page
- Continue scrolling and navigating in your browser without disturbing or losing changes to the current recipe in the extension panel
